topic: The following is a comprehensive, SEO-optimized outline for an article on "Kubernetes Security 2024", targeting a word count of 2500-3500 words. It incorporates detailed section breakdowns, keyword strategy, image placement, and internal linking opportunities, designed to outrank existing content by providing in-depth, actionable insights for the current security landscape.

images.prompt: Clean and vibrantly colored, professional digital illustration following a minimalist, modern design. Incorporate high-quality digital art in a corporate style, representing an outline of an article on Kubernetes Security for the year 2024. The outlined article has a comprehensive SEO-optimized layout with sections, keyword strategy, image placement, and internal linking opportunities all designed to provide in-depth, actionable insights on the current security landscape. Please keep in mind that the image should have no text or words visible.
